name: chuff
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a sound like the sound of someone blowing out air quickly and forcefully, or like the sound a steam engine makes: A train chuffs in the valley, and the sound rises up to us. A replica paddle-steamer now chuffs along the river carrying tourists. The bison reared, chuffing and stamping.
More examplesFewer examplesThe battered old cars and trucks chuffed and spluttered.We were coming to an intersection, turning right, chuffing to a stop.The tiger chuffs excitedly, puffing out air in a tiger greeting. The sound effects include barking, gunshot pings, howls, whistles, and chuffing motor sounds.
